author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: SPO DAO
description: DAO Net seeks to maintain a floor value for DAO tokens, using babel fees, however incentives are needed for SPOs to provide this service.
solution: Create DAO for Stake Pool Operators that will provide funding incentives for those willing to provide babel fee services.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
